doc.name: Optimizer
doc.description:
Black-box optimizer that uses JCobyla as the solver

Performs mutual information-based optimization using

References

[1] B. Charrow, V. Kumar, and N. Michael Approximate Representations for Multi-Robot Control Policies that Maximize Mutual Information, In Proc. Robotics: Science and Systems Conference (RSS), 2013.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.port: Particles input that accepts an array of record tokens. One field of the record must be labeled as "weight". Other fields will be resolved to state variables.
